IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText: Attachments -NCMEC Cybertip # 154810863, 154810864, 154471251, 154471253, 154471255 Narrative On March 2, 2023, the Maryland State Police Computer Crimes Section /Maryland Internet Crimes Against Children Task Force received NCMEC CyberTips #154810863, 154810864, 154471251, 154471253, 154471255. The CyberTips, generated by Discord, indicated that a subject uploading/possessing/distributing child pornography through the internet. The CyberTips were assigned to TFC Burnett for investigation. The CyberTip provided the following information pertaining to the suspect: Cybertips: 154810863, 154810864 Email Address: fartb100@gmail.com (Verified) Screen/User Name: ChimpingApe#4240 ESP User ID: 1071177697394442291 Cybertips: 154471251, 154471253, 154471255 Phone: +14437713854 (Verified) Email Address: chimpingape@gmail.com (Verified) Screen/User Name: ChimpingApe#8983 ESP User ID: 1017903272851406950 TFC Burnett reviewed this CyberTip and observed it to contain five reported video files, one from each of the Cybertips. Two files contained child pornography as it is defined as Maryland law. Three files appeared to be a minor but was unable to be determined. The files are described below: Cybertip: 154810863 age difficult Filename: VID_20230207_173017_411.mp4 Description: This file is a fifteen second colored video with the text Telegram: @mobakab907907 over the screen. The video depicts an unidenfidied nude person kneeling down, laying on a pillow, while an adult male rubs his erect penis on the persons anus/buttocks area. The unidentified persons body characteristics appears to be smaller compared to the adults penis and body. Upload: 73.250.15.140 on 02-08-2023 at 23:44:43 UTC Cybertip: 154810864 Filename: VID_20230107_205549_828.mp4 Description: This file is a twenty-seven second colored video of a Caucasian female child in a bathroom, the child removes her clothing and poses to the camera in a lascivious manner. Based on the size and physical development, the children appears to be 12-14 years of age. Upload: 73.250.15.140 on 02-08-2023 at 23:49:54 UTC Cybertip: 154471251 age difficult Filename : VID_20230107_205759_899.mp4 Description: This file is a twenty-eight second colored video with the text CANAL DO JU, Ju.. Comendo sua sobrinha 4 anos... Brasil (in translation: DO JU CHANNEL, ju..eating his niece 4 years..Brasil) over the screen. The video depicts a close up of a prepubescent female childs vagina, while an adult male is sodomizing the child. The child is wearing white shorts with pink hearts that are around her calves and is devoid of pubic hair. Based on the size and physical characteristics and what is labeled as 4 years, it appears the child could possibly be around 4 years of age. Upload: 73.250.15.140 on 02-03-2023 at 00:47:08 UTC Cybertip: 154471253 age difficult Filename: VID_20230107_205733_602.mp4 Description: This file is a forty-one second colored video of a nude female laying on her side a bed with an adult male vaginally penetrating her from behind. The female does have pubic hair and breast budding, but based on the size compared to the adult, the female appears to be under 18 years of age. Upload: 73.250.15.140 on 02-03-2023 at 00:47:19 UTC Cybertip: 154471255 Filename: VID_20230107_205731_308.mp4 Description: This file is a forty-four second colored video of a nude female child sitting on a bed performing fellatio on an adult males erect penis. Based on the size and physical characteristics, the child appears to be 3-5 years of age. Upload: 73.250.15.140 on 02-03-2023 at 00:47:40 UTC TFC Burnett conducted a query of the IP addresses through an open-source database. The suspects registration/login IP address 73.250.15.140 is registered through Comcast and geo locates to Prince Frederick, Maryland. TFC Burnett conducted a query of the phone number through an open-source database. The phone returns to a Beanon Bruckner and is registered to T-Mobile. A search through a law enforcement database revealed the name of Beanon Bruckner Pilkins (W/M, DOB: 9/30/2006) and his mother, Kori Lynn Pilkins Hand (W/F, DOB: 12/31/1973) and his step-father, Christipher Robert Hand (W/M, DOB: 5/20/1976) who reside at 4425 Dares Beach Rd, MD which was verified. TFC Burnett transmitted an investigative subpoena request for the Comcast IP address, Google email addresses, and T-Mobile phone number which were sent to the Howard County Office of the States Attorney. A preservation letter will be sent to Discord to preserve the suspects account. A search warrant for the Discord account will be authored. On 3/3/2023, at approximately 0743 hours, I conducted surveillance at 4425 Dares Beach Rd, MD and observed there only to be a dump truck in the driveway at this time. Case Status OPEN / PENDING ADDITIONAL INVESTIGATION

Attachments: -Signed T-Mobile subpoena -Signed Comcast subpoena -Signed Google subpoena -T-Mobile subscriber information -T-Mobile certification -Discord preservation letter -Two signed Discord search warrants -Two Maryland State Police Search Warrant Report and Return (Form 98) for Discord search warrants -Two Maryland State Police Evidence Inventory (Form 98A) for Discord search warrants -Two separate chat historys from the account ChimpingApe#8983 -Sixteen separate chat historys from the account ChimpingApe#4240 -Two Discord search warrant checklists -Twenty-one separate conversations from the account (ChimpingApe#4240) -Two separate conversations from the account (ChimpingApe#8983) Narrative: On 3/10/2023, at approximately 1000 hours, the Honorable Judge Chandlee with the Calvert County Circuit Court signed the two Discord search warrants. Both search warrants were submitted by email with the reference #33019794. I also received the signed Comcast and T-Mobile subpoenas from the States Attorneys Office. On 3/15/2023, I submitted the signed Comcast subpoena through the portal with the reference #LCR763443. Also, the signed T-Mobile subpoena was submitted through email, with the reference #33019794. On 3/16/2023, I received the two Discord search warrant returns with the below information: Account: ChimpingApe#8983 (appears to be suspects first account that was shut down): Within this return there were seven (7) videos, three (3) of which were age difficult but appeared to involve minors, the other four (4) contained child pornography. Also, there were a few chat conversations with other users, where the suspect was asking for cp (child pornography) and they warned him he would get flagged and told them he didnt care. Two files are described below: Filename #1:1070572898466680852_1070868141053317170_1070868140667449366_VID_20230107_205731_308.mp4 Description: This file is a forty-four second colored video of a nude Caucasian female child sitting on a bed while she is performing fellatio on an adult males erect penis as he is standing in front of her. Based on the size and physical characteristics, lack of pubic hair and breast budding, the child appears to be 3-5 years of age. Filename #2:1070572898466680852_1070868690104492142_1070868689664098344_VID_20230107_205949_904.mp4 Description:This file is a sixteen second colored video of a Caucasian female child wearing a blue shirt and is nude from the waist down while laying on a bed with her legs in the air. There is an adult male seen sodomizing the child. Based on the size and physical characteristics, lack of pubic hair, the child appears to be 10-12 years of age. Account: ChimpingApe#4240 (appears to be suspects second account that was shut down): Within this return there were nineteen (19) videos, two (2) of which were age difficult but appeared to involve minors, the other seven-teen (17) contained child pornography. Two are described below: Filename #1:1072644847913156728_1072646018744721419_1072646018589544478_VID_20230207_172953_185.mp4 Description:This file is a one minute and seventeen-second colored video of a nude Caucasian female child laying on a bed with her legs in the air, exposing her vagina. There is an adult female wearing a fake penis around her genital area to represent a males penis. The adult sodomizes the child with the fake penis while the child is laying down and then while she gets onto her hands and knees. Based on the size and physical characteristics, lack of pubic hair and breast budding, the child appears to be 2-5 years of age. Filename #2:1072261116593442836_1072265395752415292_1072265395387502592_VID_20230206_161936_954.mp4 Description:This file is a twisty two second colored video of a Hispanic female child wearing a pink shirt laying on a bed with her legs in the air, exposing her vagina while an adult male sodomizes the child. Based on the size and physical characteristics, lack of pubic hair, the child appears to be 4-6 years of age. TFC Burnett reviewed numerous conversations between the suspect (ChimpingApe#4240) and another Discord user mainly looking for child pornography. TFC Burnett observed the below mere synopsis of comments or words from either the suspect or another user that would be pertinent to the investigation. The full conversations are attached to the report. -2/6/2023: Discord user (Deleted user 583fa685#1097) -femboy -appears to pretend suspect is a girl -suspect mentions high school (suspect is in high school) -2/6/2023: Discord user (Brainjarmen104#7103) -(Brainjarmen104#7103): 19 you? -(ChimpingApe#4240): 16 -2/6/2023: Discord user (gallahad#0106) -(gallahad#0106): how old are you -(ChimpingApe#4240) 15:03 -2/6/2023: Discord user (Ave#9769) -(Ave#9769): grooming you -(Ave#9769): got any more pics for this perverted pedo -(Ave#9769): let his hairy pedo violate your tight hole -2/7/2023: Discord user (SamA1/4#1110) -(SamA1/4#1110): the send you cp one -(SamA1/4#1110): 7 -(SamA1/4#1110): my ill cousin -(ChimpingApe#4240): here 15 -2/8/2023: Discord user (jkkj1#0331) -(ChimpingApe#4240): -2/9/2023: Discord user: (Xandr1#1456) -(Xandr1#1456): do you do incest or wants to -(ChimpingApe#4240): he said no never -2/8/2023: (Maxine#5884) from the account (ChimpingApe#8983) -reported him -2/2/2023: (Deleted User: cc9191e6#8983) from the account(ChimpingApe#8983) -Can i get an inv to the gay cp server On 3/24/2023, I received the T-Mobile subpoena return for the phone number (443-771-3854) with the below information: Subscriber information: Margaret Pilkins Subscriber address: 4425 Dares Beach Rd, Prince Frederick, MD MSISND name: Beanon Bruckner On 3/27/2023, I received the signed Google subpoena from the States Attorneys Office. On 3/29/2023, I submitted the signed Google through the portal with reference #327791526. On 3/31/2023, the Honorable Judge Chandlee with the Calvert County Circuit Court signed the Maryland State Police Search Warrant Report and Return (Form 98) and the Maryland State Police Evidence Inventory (Form 98A) for both Discord accounts. On 4/6/2023, I received the Comcast subpoena return with the below information: Subscriber Name: CHRIS HAND Service Address: 4425 DARES BEACH RD PRINCE FREDERICK, MD 20678 Billing Address: 4425 DARES BEACH RD PRINCE FREDERICK, MD 20678 Telephone #: (410) 456-2144, (410) 000-0000 Type of Service: Internet Account Number: 8299400100022909 Account Status: Active E-mail User Ids: 7776crh@comcast.net; Korip73@comcast.net A future knock and talk will be conducted to talk to the possible juvenile suspect (Beanon Bruckner Pilkins, DOB: 9/30/2006). On 4/20/2023, I contacted Calvert County Child Protective Services and provided them with the case status and to be aware they may need to be contacted when we make contact with the suspect. Case open, investigation ongoing.

Attachments: -Maryland State Police Consent to Search and Seize (Form 78) -Maryland State Police Request for Laboratory Examination-Chain of Custody Log (Form 67) -Signed search warrant for the phone -Lab Request for service (Form 36) -Lab IR for phone Narrative: On 4/21/2023, at approximately 0625 hours, Sgt. Pitcher and I, responded to 4425 Dares Beach Rd, Prince Frederick, MD 20678 to conduct a knock and talk. Upon arrival, we made contact with the mother Kori Hand and explained the situation, which she was concerned and wanting to know the verdict of the case. Kori provided us with permission to talk with Beanon Pilkins, to figure out what the situation was with the Discord accounts. We made contact with Beanon who advised that he was being blackmailed into sending 2-3 people child pornography. Beanon explained he has been chatting with people since last year 2022, and he started talking with a couple people on different Discord servers, who would tell him to find child pornography and send it to them. Beanon advised in the Discord servers he would ask for cp servers to get files. Beanon advised he did send 4or 5 images/videos of himself to people as well. Beanon explained that he last sent a child pornography image 3 days ago and deletes the files when he is done sending them.During our conversation, Beanon advised that he had no choice and is not interested in child pornography. Beanon provided the following people he was talking to and sending files: Same person: -(Discord)-Daddy Duskmaven#8042 -(Telegram)-Dante @dantestacado Same person: -(Discord)- Anub #9689 -(Telegram)- Joe Sexy Mama @Fuckmybrainswithporn Beanon provided his following contact information and social media accounts that he has obtained child pornography on: -Discord: ChimpingApe#5392, beanonb2006@outlook.com -Telegram: Chimpingape 443-771-3854 -MEGA: Chimping Ape chimgpingape@gmail.com -Reddit: u/tequilabuh, u/HardKori73, u/Sweaty_Time_8063 -Google: beanonb0930@gmail.com Kori also provided us with consent to look through Beanons phone, by signing theMaryland State Police Consent to Search and Seize (Form 78). While browsing through Beanons purple Android One Plus 12, I observed there to be a child pornography image in the deleted folder of the photos app on the phone that was placed there 3 days ago, the file is described below. I also observed within the Discord chat with (Daddy, Duskmaven#8042) numerous child pornography files being sent to Beanon, at that point in time, I did not continue searching and seized the phone. Filename: N/A Description: This image file depicts a nude Caucausian female child laying down with her legs spread in the air, exposing her vagina and anus. Based on the size and physical characteristics, the child appears to be 5-7 years of age. The Android One Plus 12 was transported to the Maryland State Police (MSP) Prince Frederick Barrack U, placed on a Chain of Custody (Form 67) and held in the temporary locker at 0930 hours, pending a search warrant for adigital forensic examination. On 4/21/2023, TFC Burnett authored a search warrant for the iPhone, which was approved by ASA Cordero. On 4/24/2023, the Honorable Judge Rappaport with the Calvert County District Court signed the search warrant for the Android One Plus phone. At approximately 0859 hours, I retrieved the purple One Plus 12 from the MSP Barrack U temporary locker and transported to the Maryland State Police- Computer Crimes Section, 1523 Signature Drive, Suite B-N, Hanover, MD 21076.A Maryland State Police Criminal Investigation Division Computer Forensics Laboratory Request for Service (Form 36) and laboratory incident report was completed and submitted for examination of the phone. Case open, pending forensics exam.

IncidentProperty.Description: One purple Android One Plus 12 phone with pink charging cord

IncidentSuppNarrative.NarrativeText: NARRATIVE: On 9/21/2023, I received the update from the forensic laboratory that the devices were assigned to DFE Cobleigh and were under review. Case open, pending forensics

Attachment: -Maryland Department of State Police Juvenile Release Form (53) Narrative: TFC Burnett received the forensic extraction from Bruckners One Plus 12 cellphone. I reviewed the Cellebrite extraction and observed it to contain numerous chats, mostly from Telegram and Twitter with random people, where Bruckner is asking for either videos/images of child pornography or to be added to different servers to obtain those files. I also observed the phone to obtain 470 image files and 220 video files depicting child pornography as it is defined by the Maryland Law. Three random files are described below: -This file was located in a Telegram chat that the suspect sent to (Ouroboros) #587-328-7288 Filename: 1_5134608710601015922.mp4 Description: This file is a six second colored video depicting a Caucasian female child wearing a black and pink pants. The child is kneeling on the floor while she is performing fellatio on an adult males erect penis. Based on the size and physical characteristics, the child appears to be 4-6 years of age. Time Stamp: 3/21/2023 11:14:06 PM(UTC+0) Path: EXTRACTION_USERDATA.zip/data/media/0/Android/data/org.telegram.messenger/files/Telegram/Telegram Video/1_5134608710601015922.mp4 -This file was located in a Telegram chat that the suspect sent to (Dante) #172-606-7122 Filename: 4_5913567438514948694.mp4 Description: This file is a twelve second colored video depicting a nude prepubescent female child kneeling down on her hands and knees, on a Hello Kitty blanket. The child is performing fellatio on a nude adult males penis, while she is being penetrated from behind (unsure of area, due to the angle of the camera) by another nude adult males erect penis. Based on the size and physical characteristics, the child appears to be 4-6 years of age. Time Stamp: 1/12/2023 2:47:32 AM(UTC+0) Path: EXTRACTION_USERDATA.zip/data/media/0/Android/data/org.telegram.messenger/files/Telegram/Telegram Documents/4_5913567438514948694.mp4 -This file was located in the phones video folder Filename: VID-20220407-WA0005.mp4 Description: This file is a one minute and six second colored video depicting a nude prepubescent Caucasian male child laying down with his legs in the air, exposing his penis and anus. An adult male sodomizes the childs anus with his erect penis until he ejaculates. Based on the size and physical characteristics, the child appears to be 3-6 years of age. Modified: 4/21/2023 2:22:31 AM(UTC+0) Path: EXTRACTION_USERDATA.zip/data/media/0/Android/data/org.telegram.messenger/files/Telegram/Teleg ram Files/VID-20220407-WA0005.mp4 TFC Burnett completed a Maryland Department of State Police Juvenile Release Form 53 with the following charges: -1 count of Possession of Child Pornography (CR 11-208) - Filename: VID-20220407-WA0005.mp4 -2 counts of Distribution of Child Pornography (CR 11-207a4) -1_5134608710601015922.mp4 -4_5913567438514948694.mp4 On 11/30/2023, at approximately 0600 hours, Sgt. Pitcher and I responded to 4425 Dares Beach Road, Prince Frederick, Md to make contact with Kori Hand and Beanon Bruckner. Upon our arrival, we observed no lights on in the house and barely any vehicles in the driveway. Numerous knocks at the door were made with no answer. At approximately 0748 hours, I contacted Kori Hand by phone (410-456-2144) and she explained that she was not living at the house right now due to the power being turned off. Hand advised she was staying with her mother at 5038 Erika Pl, Port Republic, MD. Hand was willing to meet up to go over the case status. I provided Sgt. Pitcher her contact information to schedule when Hand and Bruckner could meet with him for the paperwork. At approximately 1629 hours, I was contacted by Bruckners and Hands Attorney, Todd Mohink (410-766-0113) who advised he was hired by Hand and to follow up with him for anything further on the case. Later on, Sgt. Pitcher advised they scheduled to meet up with him on 12/7/2023. On 12/7/2023, at approximately 1530 hours, Sgt. Pitcher made contact with Hand and Bruckner at the Maryland State Police Prince Frederick Barrack, where Bruckner was charged on a Maryland Department of State Police Juvenile Release Form (53). MSP Form 53 (Juvenile Release Form) with the following: - Possession of Child Pornography (1 Count) - Distribution of Child Pornography (2 Counts) Brucker was released to the care and custody of Hand. No further police action was initiated. This case will be forwarded to Calvert County Juvenile Services for disposition. Case closed by arrest.
